data.title: The Exit 8
data.meta_description: Wiki link: https://exit-8.fandom.com/wiki/Exit_8_Wiki The Exit 8 is a short walking simulator inspired by Japanese underground passageways, liminal spaces the Exit 8 Unnamed Man Multiple Anomalies (main antagonists) Third door open Security camera poster eyes move. Multiple no smoking posters...
data.text:
Wiki link: https://exit-8.fandom.com/wiki/Exit_8_Wiki

The Exit 8 is a short walking simulator inspired by Japanese underground passageways, liminal spaces the Exit 8

Unnamed Man

Multiple Anomalies (main antagonists)

Anomalies[]

Third door open

Security camera poster eyes move.

Multiple no smoking posters.

First door is missing.

Red water flood

Woman on poster has deformed face.

Woman peeking out from second door.

Theater poster turns into picture of decomposed face.

Man walks fast towards the player.

Lights turn off.

Humanoid figure runs out from wall.

Man smiles.

Doorknob on third door is in the middle of the door.

Twin businessmen.

Extra yellow tiles in middle of floor.

Security camera poster follows the player.

Lights flicker.

All posters become the makeup poster.

Man appears to be bigger than the player.

Crooked ceiling light.

Fake exit stairs.

Banging behind the first door.

Red glowing camera on ceiling.

Black slime dripping from first vent.

Back of ceiling light sign is upside-down.

Posters grow bigger.

Faces on yellow tiles.

Man looks at the player.

Man's face deforms/becomes half-white.

"Turn back turn back turn back" written on back of ceiling light sign.

Face on ceiling.

Drawings on the wall with the pictures.
